The **Value Object Pattern** is a Python ğŸ package that streamlines the creation and management of value objects ğŸ“¦ in your projects. Value objects are immutable, self-validating objects that represent descriptive aspects of the domain with no conceptual identity. This pattern is essential for maintaining clean ğŸ§¹, maintainable, and bug-resistant ğŸ› codebases by encapsulating domain-specific logic and ensuring consistency across your application ğŸ“±.

## ğŸ“¥ Installation

You can install **Value Object Pattern** using `pip`:

```bash
pip install value-object-pattern
```
